transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Hi, is this Zhi? Hey, this is Arjun calling from MongoDB. Do you have a minute?

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Yes, this is Zhi. I'm the IT Director at Acme Corp. Uh, what can I help you with?

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Thanks for picking up. The reason I’m calling is I noticed Acme Corp. is moving towards microservices, and you’re currently on DynamoDB, right?

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Yeah, that’s correct. We’re modernizing a lot right now.

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Awesome. I’ll keep it quick. Have you looked at MongoDB Atlas at all? We see a lot of healthcare orgs choosing Atlas for flexibility with data and compliance.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: To be honest, migrating data models sounds risky. Our workloads are pretty complex, and compliance is always a big thing.

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: I totally get that. Actually, Atlas supports HIPAA and other key healthcare standards out of the box. And, our professional services team has handled DynamoDB-to-Mongo migrations many times.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: But what about vendor lock-in? That’s, uh, another pain point right now.

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Great question. Actually, Atlas runs on AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud, so you can deploy anywhere and avoid being locked into one cloud provider.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Okay, but honestly, price is a real concern. DynamoDB is predictable on cost. How does Atlas compare?

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Yeah, cost matters. Atlas pricing is usage-based too and often more efficient at scale, since you can optimize workload placement and tiering. I can show you a total cost comparison if that’s helpful.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Maybe. Can you, um, email me more info? Something on compliance, migration, and pricing?

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Absolutely. I’ll send over a follow-up with case studies in healthcare, details on HIPAA compliance, and migration resources. Would that work?

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: You got it. I’ll get that out to you today. Have a great rest of your week, Zhi.
